components.name: AboutComponent
components.templateData:
About PseudoWrite

Welcome to PseudoWrite, where your writing journey is assisted by cutting-edge AI technology. Our platform offers unique tools to help authors at every stage of their writing process, from brainstorming ideas to polishing final drafts.

Our AI-driven features provide personalized suggestions, plot development ideas, character insights, and much more, helping you overcome writer's block and enhance your storytelling.

Whether you're a seasoned author or just starting, PseudoWrite is here to support your creative journey. Embrace the future of writing with PseudoWrite, where every story finds its voice.

variables.name: appConfig
editorConfig
variables.defaultValue:
{
  editable: true,
  spellcheck: true,
  height: 'calc(100vh - 100px)',
  minHeight: '0',
  maxHeight: 'auto',
  width: 'auto',
  minWidth: '0',
  translate: 'yes',
  enableToolbar: true,
  showToolbar: true,
  placeholder: 'Write Chapter Here...',
  defaultFontName: 'roboto',
  fonts: [
    { class: 'roboto', name: 'Roboto' },
    { class: 'arial', name: 'Arial' },
    { class: 'times-new-roman', name: 'Times New Roman' },
  ],
  sanitize: true,
  toolbarPosition: 'top',
  toolbarHiddenButtons: toolbarHiddenButtons,
}
